sent.orig: Combination of pepper ×pepper and Pepper ×sweet pepper & protective ground cultivation wouldplant.
sent.trans: 辣×辣与辣×甜的亲本类型配组及采用保护地制种有利提高座果率及单株种子产量。

sent.orig: Or edible some pungent foods, like ginger, pepper, Chinese prickly ash, pepper and so on.
sent.trans: 或者食用一些辛辣的食品，如生姜，胡椒，花椒，辣椒等。

sent.orig: This is green pepper, not hot pepper.
If afraid of hot pepper flavour, remember to remove all seeds of the pepper.
sent.trans: 如果怕辣的话，要记得将辣椒的种子取出不用。

sent.orig: Root exudates pepper were obtained pepper seedlings in pot-culture.
sent.trans: 根系分泌物为水培获得，处理采用盆栽，有机化合物利用气质联用仪(GC-MS)测定。
